nodes.text: Tezli Odo was a female Rodian who lived on the floating mining colony of Cloud City, located in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin, at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY. Within Cloud City, she ran the Hatchery, a shop which sold exotic pets and various food animals. The shop was located on Market Row, a commercial corridor in the city's Port Town district.

Tezli Odo was first mentioned in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. She is listed as a merchant players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
